A quick example of a series of simulations in a tank
```{r echo=F, warning = F, message=F}
paths <- as.numeric(c(NA,NA,NA))
for (i in 1:20)
{
  dataout <- krilltankinit()
  paths <- rbind(paths,dataout)
}
krilltankplot(paths)
```
